newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Aug copper output up 7.22 percent yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Aug copper output up 7.22 percent yr/yr.

text.p: China's copper output totalled 591,000 tonnes in the first eight months of 1996, up by 7.22 percent compared with the same period last year, the State Statistical Bureau said on Monday.
Copper production in August alone was 73,000 tonnes, the bureau said.
